Html:
Hi Mark,

I am currently wondering if it is possible to select the playback device as seen in WaveOut?

AFAIK DirectSound lets you choose the device for playback and even has a default device. Are you planning to implement that as well or do you have any particular reason why you left that out?

thanks,

Christoph

Hi Christoph,

I didn't write this particular DirectSoundOut implementation, but I agree it would be a nice feature to support device selection. Hopefully we can provide that in a future version

Mark
